name: Incremental Unlimited PC
description:
Incremental Unlimited 1 & Incremental Unlimited 2 are amazing free android games made by Number Engineer.

With the permission of the developer, I have created my own version for PC!

This game is still in very early stages, feedback is appreciated!

Thank you for taking your time to be here and checking out my game!

Netcore 2.1 is required to run.

[Netcore for:  Windows | Mac | Linux]

WARNING: CHANGING GAME WINDOWS SIZE IS VERY BUGGY!!!

If you encounter a bug send me a direct message over discord (SW_CreeperKing#5787)

I hang out on the IU2 discord server: https://discord.gg/pFTdKgM come join and say hi!

if the game window is too big or small you can start the game with the terminal/command prompt with an extra integer like: "dotnet 'Incremental Unlimited PC.dll' 4" will start the game with a scale of 4. As of POC-4 the game starts with a scale of 3

I do recommend that you don't bring old save files into newer versions. I also do not recommend editing the save files.
